title: MEGA Packet loss and Disconnects..
body:
I don't understand what's going on.
My internet is fine, I have a good PC, I have all the controls set to lowest quality... Everything suggested has been done.
I do not get high ping but I will get INSANE packet loss and eventually keep disconnecting over and over.
It was fine earlier today but everything started hitting the fan again.
I am NOT the only one with this issue... What is going on????

replies.body: You could be having an unstable connection either local or with your ISP that can cause packet loss and input delays.  Reducing your quality settings won't do much if it's a connection issue.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an analysis of your specific case to know for sure.  Let me know what you find!

It said I had a high amount of packet loss and experienced some connectivity spikes.
I use a short ethernet cable and have good internet, ive re installed the game and reset my router plenty of times.
No difference...

Thanks for the info!  Even with great internet, you can still have issues reaching specific servers (like the game server).   Reinstalling wouldn't really do anything for a connection issue either.  Instead, go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Test it in a custom and let me know how it goes.
